title: Chestcommands商店问题
author: zhulongcaohello
txt_content:
menu-settings:

  # REQUIRED
  # Appears as the title of the menu.
  name: '确认购买'

  # REQUIRED
  # The number of rows in the menu.
  rows: 3
  # OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  auto-refresh: 6



######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################




yes: 
  COMMAND: 'console: vipsys give {player} SVIP 30d'
  POINTS: 300
  NAME: '&a确定购买SVIP'
  ID: 35
  DATA-VALUE: 5
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 2
no: 
  NAME: '&a取消购买SVIP'
  ID: 35
  DATA-VALUE: 14
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 2
复制代码cc版本3.1.4，但是还是没有用，点券不会减少。如果写command: 'console: vipsys give {player} SVIP 30d;console: points take 300'
时，如果points为0，VIP照常给，points也没扣
